articles.title: Moon goes blood red this weekend: Parts of America will witness 2022's first total lunar eclipse - Economic Times
articles.description: Partial stages of the eclipse will be visible across Africa, Europe and the Middle East.
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, FLORIDA: A total lunar eclipse will grace the night skies this weekend, providing longer than usual thrills for stargazers across North and South America.

articles.title: "Deeply Troubled": US Slams Israeli Police Over Violence At Al Jazeera Journalist's Funeral - NDTV
articles.description: The United States is "deeply troubled" by Israeli police's intrusion Friday at the funeral of slain Palestinian-American reporter Shireen Abu Akleh, Secretary of State Antony Blinken said.
